http://ontology.deic.dk/cv/beer-ontology: A good title for your vocabulary
A short name for your vocabulary
Give a good defintion of this vocabulary, what it is, what is going to be use for, etc.
Put ORCID no of the vocabulary creator, repeat this row for every additional creator.
State under what license this vocabulary is provided, preferably chose license from https://spdx.org/licenses/ , since SPDX.org provides machine-actionable licenses
Always provide the version of the vocabulary. You can use form majorChange.minorChange.bugFix (e.g., 1.0.1a)
The initial date of the vocabulary creation in form of YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss+timeZoneOffset (e.g., 2020-10-30T13:43:00+00:00)
The date of the last update of the vocabulary in form of YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss+timeZoneOffset (e.g., 2020-10-30T13:43:00+00:00)

column4: This is a set of controlled terms which are deprecated.
